pages.text: The $(9)Gem Cutting Table$() is used to upgrade $(l:apotheosis:adventure/gems/gems)Gems$().$(p)Upgrading a Gem usually costs $(9)Gem Dust$(), $(9)Rarity Materials$(), and a second Gem of the same purity.

pages.title: Upgrade Costs
pages.text: The cost of upgrading a Gem increases with its Purity.$(p)Stronger gems require more $(9)Gem Dust$() and higher-tier $(9)Rarity Materials$().$(p)The exact cost to upgrade a gem can be seen in JEI.
